metadata.title: CVE-2018-18339 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect object lifecycle in WebAudio in Google Chrome prior to71.0.3578.80 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heapcorruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
